name: 尹秦清
objective:
隨著網路技術的發展，蓬勃的網路創業挑戰了傳統的實體店面，並在現代商業環境中提供了巨大的機會。新的數位技術和移動設備不僅改變了我們的生活，也改變了消費者的行為和溝通管道。本課程結合了創新創業與數位時代的商業環境，包括商業策略、創新思維和創業家精神。
With the development of internet technology, vigorous internet entrepreneurship has challenged traditional physical stores and provided huge opportunities in the modern business environment. new digital technologies and mobile devices do not only change our lives but also change consumers' behavior and communication channels. This course combines innovation and entrepreneurship with the business environment in the digital age, including business strategy, innovative thinking, and entrepreneurship.
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction
Week 2: Entrepreneurship 
Week 3: Entrepreneurial team I
Week 4: Entrepreneurial team II
Week 5: Financial management I
Week 6: Financial management II
Week 7: Holidays
Week 8: Business opportunities in digital times
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10: Innovative thinking I
Week 11: Innovative thinking II
Week 12: Business models I
Week 13: Business models II
Week 10: Entrepreneurship marketing tactics I
Week 11: Entrepreneurship marketing tactics II
Week 16: Prepare a business plan 
Week 17: Final report 
Week 18: Final report
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance & Class Participation: 20% 
2. Case Study Presentation: 20%
3. Midterm Exam: 30%
4. Final Report: 30%
